name: Kiraguru.com
tag_list: rent, rental, daily-rental-apartment, rental-boat, car-rental, dress-for-rent, holiday-house, holiday-villa
overview:
Kiraguru.com is the central place to rent anything and everything.

Vacation homes, apart hotels, short-term stay apartments, houses for rent, car rentals, dresses for rent, boats, sailboats for rent, private lessons and much much more are at Kiraguru.com.

You can rent anything and everything under the protection of Kiraguru.com. Not only you can satisfy all your short term needs at Kiraguru.com, but you can also rent out your home, goods and services when you are not using them and earn additional income.
